programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: Ayumi tries to lighten Keima's mood after his fight with Chihiro.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: Keima prepares Chihiro to confess to Yuta.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.sub-title: Her First Errand -- Tea for Three
programme.desc: Keima teaches Elsie about dating sims so she can buy him a rare version of "Love Tears" while he attends a game fair.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: An idealistic new teacher becomes Keima's next target.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: Keima has a plan to make Jun see him as an equal.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.sub-title: There's Always a Sun in Your Heart
programme.desc: Keima and Jun take in a pro wrestling match where Keima exposes Jun's desire to help others as a desire to help herself.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: Keima is asked by a game studio to help create the perfect dating sim game.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: The goddess Apollo appears, but she is immediately stabbed by the leader of Vintage, an organization that seeks to restore the Ancient Demons.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: The goddess Apollo appears, but she is immediately stabbed by the leader of Vintage, an organization that seeks to restore the Ancient Demons.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: During the simultaneous walk-home-from-school events, Keima is attacked by a wave of flying books; section chief Nora drops by the Katsuragi residence to see Elsie.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: During the simultaneous walk-home-from-school events, Keima is attacked by a wave of flying books; section chief Nora drops by the Katsuragi residence to see Elsie.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: The Ancient Demon blade in Kanon has been removed, but she still remains unconscious; Keima must search for the remaining goddesses and restore their power, but one of the potential hosts approaches him first.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: Shiori's conflicting feelings for Keima make it difficult for her to finish her novel for the Mai High Festival; Keima makes a suggestion to help.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: When the stress of the goddess search finally gets to Keima and causes him to fall ill, he takes advantage of this to have the last two girls visit him.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: Haqua questions Bureau Chief Dokuro about the rumors she heard from Nora concerning goddesses and Vintage, but Dokuro rejects her claims; unsatisfied with the response, Haqua prepares to leave hell.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: On the night before the Mai High Festival, Keima and Chihiro continue their date on the school rooftop; Chihiro seems confused by Keima's behavior, but he continues his quest.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: Still angry with Keima, Ayumi is dismayed when she must work with him after he is made the 2B Class Cafe barista; Keima attempts to talk to her, but her anger and Chihiro's presence make it difficult.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: Keima asks Ayumi to meet him at Kozue River; Haqua explains to Chihiro why it is important that Keima makes Ayumi fall in love with him.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: Keima asks Ayumi to meet him at Kozue River; Haqua explains to Chihiro why it is important that Keima makes Ayumi fall in love with him.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: Keima and Elsie are saved from bullies by Kusunoki Kasuga.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: Kusunoki becomes embarrassed on her date with Keima but continues it hoping it will draw out her feminine side. After failing to connect, Kusonoki and Keima jump to sharing an ice cream.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.desc: Elsie meets her friend Haqua.

programme.title: The World God Only Knows
programme.sub-title: The Section Chief Regains Her Pride
programme.desc: Keima suggests Haqua should team up with Elsie, but she refuses.

programme.sub-title: It Always Rains at the End of a Hard Journey
